title: evening_dog_feeding_at_mameefarm
summary: Observation of dogs being fed during the evening feeding routine.
description: This data unit documents the evening feeding of dogs at MaMeeFarm. Dogs are fed twice daily as part of a routine care schedule, once in the morning and once in the evening. This record represents the second feeding cycle of the day.

linked_references.note: Morning dog feeding on the same day.

external_reference.note: Image shows dogs awaiting or receiving food during evening feeding.
